name: Inabel Handwoven Blanket
description: A traditional Ilocano handwoven textile made from cotton using wooden looms. Known for its durability and beautiful geometric patterns.

name: Ikat Woven Shawl
description: A unique textile created through a resist dyeing process before weaving. Each piece carries intricate patterns symbolizing cultural identity.

name: Kalinga Traditional Skirt
description: A handwoven skirt featuring bold red, black, and white stripes with symbolic tribal motifs representing the Kalinga heritage.

name: Inabel Table Runner
description: A finely woven table runner crafted by Ilocano weavers. Combines functionality with artistic patterns for home decoration.

name: Ikat Decorative Pillowcase
description: Handwoven pillowcase using Ikat dyeing techniques, showcasing abstract patterns and rich cultural artistry.

name: Kalinga Beaded Sash
description: A traditional Kalinga sash interwoven with beads and vibrant patterns, worn during rituals and celebrations.

name: Inabel Scarf
description: Soft and lightweight cotton scarf woven on traditional wooden looms. Stylish and breathable for everyday wear.

name: Ikat Wall Hanging
description: An ornamental wall hanging showcasing Ikat's complex dyeing and weaving traditions, perfect for home interiors.

name: Kalinga Headcloth
description: A symbolic headcloth worn by men of the Kalinga tribe, woven with red and black threads representing bravery and identity.
